description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has stolen the Active Directory database from targeted environments and used [Wevtutil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0645) to extract event log information.(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory Volt Typhoon June 2023)(Citation: Secureworks BRONZE SILHOUETTE May 2023)
